description: This file defines API routes for calendar-related operations using FastAPI. It includes a route to list upcoming calendar events within a specified number of days, interfacing with a calendar service.

methods.name: List[Dict] get_events(days: int = Query(7, ge=1, le=30, description="Number of days to look ahead"))
methods.description: API endpoint to retrieve upcoming calendar events for a specified number of days.

ctags.name: get_events
ctags.pattern: /^def get_events(days: int = Query(7, ge=1, le=30, description="Number of days to look ahead")) ->/
ctags.signature: (days: int = Query(7, ge=1, le=30, description="Number of days to look ahead"))
